member.name: T:Polib.NetCore.Mvc.IRazorPageTranslationManager
member.summary: Specifies the contract required for classes that inject .po files translation capabilities into razor views.

member.name: M:Polib.NetCore.Mvc.IRazorPageTranslationManager.H(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns a localized HTML-encoded string from a translated .po file, optionally formatting the result.
member.param: The identifier of the localized string.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.name: M:Polib.NetCore.Mvc.IRazorPageTranslationManager.Hx(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns a contextual localized HTML-encoded string from a translated .po file, optionally formatting the result.
member.param: The context to use.
The identifier of the singular form of the translation.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.name: M:Polib.NetCore.Mvc.IRazorPageTranslationManager.Hn(System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns the singular or plural form of a localized HTML-encoded string from a translated .po file, optionally formatting the result.
member.param: The identifier of the singular form of the translation.
The identifier of the plural form of the translation.
A number that determines the singular or plural form to choose from.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.
